class.name: PinJoint
class.description: Pin joint for 3D rigid bodies. It pins 2 bodies (rigid or static) together. See also [Generic6DOFJoint].

method.name: get_param
method.description: Returns the value of the specified parameter.

method.name: set_param
method.description: Sets the value of the specified parameter.

members.member: The force with which the pinned objects stay in positional relation to each other. The higher, the stronger.
The force with which the pinned objects stay in velocity relation to each other. The higher, the stronger.
If above 0, this value is the maximum value for an impulse that this Joint produces.
